fields.Title: BOARDWALK / THE PIGS
fields.Description: The Pigs! Evrart arranges you to meet the woman who has been posing as a police officer. She's carrying an attachment of sirens and police lights. She's got your gun.

fields.Title: You: ""Ma'am, I'm here to help. Tell me w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ma'am, I'm here to help. Tell me what's wrong."
fields.Alternate1: "Ma'am, we're here to help. Tell us what's wrong."

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""Disturbance reported, authorize de..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Disturbance reported, authorize deadly force. SECTOR, TAKE THE SHOT!" Her head snaps at you. "BIG RED KEY, BIG RED KEY!"

fields.Title: You: ""Let's just talk, alright?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's just talk, alright?"

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Her eyes bulge with terror. Veins p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her eyes bulge with terror. Veins protrude on her forehead.

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""Subject yourself to a FULL BODY CA..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Subject yourself to a FULL BODY CAVITY SEARCH! PROHIBITED MATERIALS CONCEALED IN NOSTRILS, EARS, MOUTH, NAVEL, URETHRA, FORESKIN, VAGINA, AND RECTUM!"

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""LATERAL VASCULAR NECK RESTRAINT! C..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "LATERAL VASCULAR NECK RESTRAINT! CAROTID SLEEPER! CAROTID SLEEPER! Critically reducing blood from passing through the neck of the suspect!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Easy..." the lieutenant whispers...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy..." the lieutenant whispers. "Press her too hard and she'll..."

fields.Title: Composure: "In this moment of hesitation she al..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In this moment of hesitation she almost doesn't seem disturbed, but like someone suddenly waking from a deep sleep.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is bad," the lieutenant whisp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is bad," the lieutenant whispers. "Getting your weapon back is the priority. We can't have an unhinged civilian running around with a gun."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Her hand is trembling from some sor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her hand is trembling from some sort of neurodegenerative disease.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "There's no way you can take aim and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's no way you can take aim and fire before she gets a shot off.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm with the rat squad!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm with the rat squad!"

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Magnesium, drouamine, maybe even  s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Magnesium, drouamine, maybe even  speed... My god, she has speed on her? What else?

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Recent. Self-inflicted."
fields.Dialogue Text: Recent. Self-inflicted.

fields.Title: Logic: "There's a scenario unfolding in her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a scenario unfolding in her head right now. It has nothing to do with what's happening here.

fields.Title: You: "Nope, not right now. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Nope, not right now. [Leave.]
fields.Alternate1: "Doesn't look good. Let's deal with this later." [Leave.]

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""SUSPECT IS ON THE LOOSE! SUSPECT A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "SUSPECT IS ON THE LOOSE! SUSPECT AT LARGE! Officer administers street justice at her own peril!"

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""THAT ONE EXTRA LICK WITH A BATON O..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "THAT ONE EXTRA LICK WITH A BATON OR EXTRA KNEE STRIKE ABOVE WHAT WAS ACTUALLY REQUIRED! SUSPECT IS UNDER CONTROL! SUSPECT IS UNDER CONTROL!"

fields.Title: You: ""No! I need this ledger to take not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No! I need this ledger to take notes."

fields.Title: The Pigs: "She doesn't even flinch as you reac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She doesn't even flinch as you reach out and disentangle the familiar-looking lieutenant's cap from her mountain of RCM paraphernalia.

fields.Title: The Pigs: "The old woman doesn't react to your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old woman doesn't react to your touch.

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""Fuck-up," she repeats, "fuck up, f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck-up," she repeats, "fuck up, fuck up, you fucked up, you fucked up, Gareth!" Spit is flying everywhere as she screams in the megaphone: "AGGRAVATED ASSAULT, MAN DOWN, SUSPECT ON FOOT!"

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Is one of those things a... police..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Is one of those things a... police cap?

fields.Title: You: ""That's right, Pigs, give me the gu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right, Pigs, give me the gun. It will be alright. It's mine."

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Pigs: ""CONFINED QUARTERS, ASSAILANT COMIN..."]
The Pigs: ""Failure to comply. Suspect is disp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Failure to comply. Suspect is displaying aggression! OFFICER UNDER DURESS! OFFICER UNDER DURESS!"

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""The man appears to be pulling out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The man appears to be pulling out an object from his pocket!" Her eyes fill with terror. "FEAR UNDER THREAT! FEAR UNDER THREAT!"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not moving.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not moving."

fields.Title: You: ""Careful, I'm packing fire too..."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Careful, I'm packing fire too..." (Flash your piece.)
fields.Alternate1: "I got a gun too! Looks like it's a gun-off!" (Cock *both* barrels.)

fields.Title: Suggestion: "There has to be a way to resolve th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There has to be a way to resolve this situation peacefully.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant coughs. "You're taki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant coughs. "You're taking those, are you?"

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure." The lieutenant gives you hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure." The lieutenant gives you his usual firm stare. "I guess that's fine."

fields.Title: The Pigs: "With a swift, poorly coordinated mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With a swift, poorly coordinated move the woman slams the megaphone against her lips and teeth. A trickle of blood runs down her chin. She doesn't notice it.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "It's hard to say. It's been so long..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's hard to say. It's been so long since you wore yours.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Hands on the...?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Hands on the...?

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""GET ON THE GROUND! I WANT YOU ON T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "GET ON THE GROUND! I WANT YOU ON THE PAVEMENT RIGHT NOW! THIS IS THE PIGS!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I guess I got my answer." The lieu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I guess I got my answer." The lieutenant gives you his usual firm stare.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes, I'm the back-up." (Resist a y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, I'm the back-up." (Resist a yawn.) "Here to back you up."

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""Nowhere..." she repeats, sudden sa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nowhere..." she repeats, sudden sadness in her eyes. There's a moment of clarity. "Mr. Morrand? No I..." She raises the megaphone and screams: "AGGRAVATED ASSAULT, MAN DOWN, SUSPECT ON FOOT!"

fields.Title: Interfacing: "That's *the* gun, man! That's *your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's *the* gun, man! That's *your* gun. Please get it back!

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Yes, sure. But also -- in a less ab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, sure. But also -- in a less abstract way -- the neurodegenerative disease I mentioned earlier.

fields.Title: The Pigs: "Scavenged battery-powered police li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Scavenged battery-powered police lights protrude from her back. The flickering light-show reveals a gun in her shaking hand.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're making it worse, officer,"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're making it worse, officer," the lieutenant says quietly. His eyes never leave the woman's face.

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""CONFISCATED CONTRABAND!" The megap..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "CONFISCATED CONTRABAND!" The megaphone makes her voice almost painfully metallic. "RESTRICTED ACCESS, TWO KILOS MISSING, EYE-WITNESS REPORT COMPROMISED!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you." He pockets the drugs...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you." He pockets the drugs. "I'm doing this to help you. We need to focus on the case."

fields.Title: You: ""You're right, of course. Let's do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, of course. Let's do this!"

fields.Title: You: "Time to get my gun!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Time to get my gun!

fields.Title: You: ""What's the situation?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's the situation?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "What happened to make her like this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What happened to make her like this?

fields.Title: Logic: "She didn't consume them. She didn't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She didn't consume them. She didn't look high. She 'confiscated' them, a little like you are doing now.

fields.Title: You: ""Kim?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Confirmed. Don't listen to your gla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Confirmed. Don't listen to your glands right now. Listen to me. The lady asked, if you're the backup?

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Does she not believe you're actuall..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Does she not believe you're actually a police officer?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Madam! Please drop the firearm imm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Madam! Please drop the firearm immediately!"

fields.Title: You: ""Easy, ma'am, take it easy...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy, ma'am, take it easy..."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, what should we do, Kim?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, what should we do, Kim?"

fields.Title: Composure: "His shoulders relax and a look of r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His shoulders relax and a look of realization appears in his eyes... Did he notice something?

fields.Title: You: ""I wasn't taking anything out of my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wasn't taking anything out of my pocket."

fields.Title: You: ""It's just a standard flashlight, m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's just a standard flashlight, ma'am. Calm down."

fields.Title: You: ""Ma'am... I got a gun.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ma'am... I got a gun."

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""DON'T MOVE!" She seems to grit her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "DON'T MOVE!" She seems to grit her teeth. "HANDS ON YOUR HEAD, HUMAN SHIELD! HANDS ON YOUR FUCKING HEAD!"

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe. Probably. You know me.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe. Probably. You know me."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's your hat." The lieutenant nod..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's your hat." The lieutenant nods.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right." The lieutenant gives you h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right." The lieutenant gives you his usual firm stare. Then sighs. "Okay."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think she's on drugs," the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think she's on drugs," the lieutenant whispers. "Being *off* drugs might actually be the problem here..."

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "This is dangerous. You're 70% certa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is dangerous. You're 70% certain you always leave your gun loaded.

fields.Title: Half Light: "She's losing it -- one twitch and t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's losing it -- one twitch and there will be blood.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Too late, lieutenant."
fields.Dialogue Text: Too late, lieutenant.

fields.Title: The Pigs: "The woman looks at you, but through..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman looks at you, but through you. Like you don't exist. Her eyes gleam feverishly and the rotating police-beacon lights reveal deep scratch marks on her cheeks.

fields.Title: You: ""Please identify yourself, ma'am?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Please identify yourself, ma'am?"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "She thinks she's a police officer....."
fields.Dialogue Text: She thinks she's a police officer... Try treating her like a police officer. A *lower-ranking* police officer.

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""Sir..." She hesitates, looking aro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sir..." She hesitates, looking around in confusion. The three barrelled pepperbox wavers in her hand.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You might not want to take those."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You might not want to take those." The lieutenant states firmly. "You seem to have a slight... problem..."

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""I do?" The question is addressed t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I do?" The question is addressed to herself more than you. "Gareth? No I..." She raises the megaphone and screams: "AGGRAVATED ASSAULT, MAN DOWN, SUSPECT ON FOOT!"

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""OFFICER COMPROMISED, UNLAWFUL IMPE..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "OFFICER COMPROMISED, UNLAWFUL IMPERSONATION! PIGS *EN ROUTE*, ENGAGE AT WILL!!!"

fields.Title: You: ""That's it, you're under arrest!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's it, you're under arrest!"

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""Rat squad?" The question is addres..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Rat squad?" The question is addressed to herself more than you. "But I thought... But Mr. Morrand..." The megaphone raises and she screams: "AGGRAVATED ASSAULT, MAN DOWN, SUSPECT ON FOOT!"

fields.Title: You: ""It's okay, ma'am. Everything's gon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's okay, ma'am. Everything's gonna be alright."

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""But..." Her eyes fill with tears,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But..." Her eyes fill with tears, then suddenly she slams the megaphone against her lips and teeth. Blood gushes down her chin, but she doesn't notice it.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Okay, she's actually *more* agitate..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay, she's actually *more* agitated now. My bad.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "It's not a code. Just disjointed wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not a code. Just disjointed words.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ma'am, please..." The lieutenant i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ma'am, please..." The lieutenant is trying to maintain eye-contact. "We want to help you, but you need to lower that weapon."

fields.Title: You: ""The sabre is only decorative. It's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The sabre is only decorative. It's not a threat to you."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh. Is that yours?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh. Is that yours?"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm *confiscating* these. As evide..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm *confiscating* these. As evidence."

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""You are?" The question is addresse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You are?" The question is addressed to herself more than you. "Mr. Morrand? No I..." She raises the megaphone and screams: "AGGRAVATED ASSAULT, MAN DOWN, SUSPECT ON FOOT!"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Loneliness."
fields.Dialogue Text: Loneliness.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer..." The lieutenant shakes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer..." The lieutenant shakes his head and adds: "There is *no* way I'm leaving it like this."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods. His eyes stay..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods. His eyes stay on the swaying firearm.

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""Put your hands where I can see the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Put your hands where I can see them," the ageing woman under a mountain of police paraphernalia mumbles to herself, then notices you and reaches for the megaphone...
fields.Sequence: TravelTo(Tequila Sunset, TeqPigsPos, 1, false);TravelTo(Kim Kitsuragi, KimPigsPos, 1, false);LuaRun(SetAreaState("BOARDWALK_PIGS_TRIGGER","off"));

fields.Title: Half Light: "You shouldn't be here. Something's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You shouldn't be here. Something's very wrong with her. She's completely out of control.

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""Wh... what?" She lowers the megaph..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wh... what?" She lowers the megaphone and stares at the gun in her hand.

fields.Title: You: ""Ma'am, I just wanna talk to you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ma'am, I just wanna talk to you."
fields.Alternate1: "Ma'am, we just wanna talk to you."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods.

fields.Title: You: ""Fine, you take them then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine, you take them then."

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""But back-up..." She looks around,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But back-up..." She looks around, bewildered. "I thought Mr. Morrand..." She raises the megaphone and screams: "AGGRAVATED ASSAULT, MAN DOWN, SUSPECT ON FOOT!"

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's grateful you did this."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's grateful you did this.

fields.Title: Volition: "Listen to him. For once."
fields.Dialogue Text: Listen to him. For once.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Yeah, back her up, right up against..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, back her up, right up against those boxes and do some sex-healing.

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""RESISTING ARREST! CONFINED QUARTER..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "RESISTING ARREST! CONFINED QUARTERS! DROP YOUR HEAD!" She bashes the megaphone against her head. Repeatedly. Then screams in the bloody mouthpiece: "COME IN DISPATCH! COME IN FUCK! CIVILIAN ENGAGEMENT!!!"

fields.Title: You: ""Eee... I'm in full RCM lieutenant'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Eee... I'm in full RCM lieutenant's uniform. Trust me. I'm a cop."
fields.Alternate1: "Eee... I'm in full RCM lieutenant's uniform and look at my partner. We're cops alright."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Get the gun, lieutenant, it's okay...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Get the gun, lieutenant, it's okay. It's safe, he thinks. Just get it.

fields.Title: The Pigs: "The woman stands, slumped. She look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman stands, slumped. She looks catatonic under her mountain of RCM paraphernalia.

fields.Title: You: "Pick up the RCM cap."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pick up the RCM cap.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["boardwalk.thepigs_blackc_esprit_saw_rcm_cap"] == true  and  CheckItem("hat_rcm") == false  and  Variable["boardwalk.thepigs_took_rcm_cap"] == false

fields.Title: You: ""I don't feel comfortable being sep..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't feel comfortable being separated from my multitool."

fields.Title: You: "Leave her be. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Leave her be. [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""I'm with the Remote Viewers Divisi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm with the Remote Viewers Division."

fields.Title: Composure: "The situation looks bad. Calm yours..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The situation looks bad. Calm yourself. Steady your breathing.

fields.Title: Volition: "STOP! For the love of god, don't."
fields.Dialogue Text: STOP! For the love of god, don't.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Big red key? That's code for the ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Big red key? That's code for the battering ram. Cop talk. You know this.

fields.Title: You: ""Look, ma'am..." (Point to your clo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look, ma'am..." (Point to your clothes.) "White rectangles. I *am* a cop."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (CheckEquipped("jacket_rcm ")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_patrol_cloak")  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_suede"))  and  IsKimHere() == false

fields.Title: Empathy: "So that's how Cunoesse must have fe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So that's how Cunoesse must have felt... right before you fired a shot at her.

fields.Title: You: ""We can solve this peacefully, plea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We can solve this peacefully, please lower the weapon."

fields.Title: You: ""Patrol officer, I have to sign you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Patrol officer, I have to sign you up for a disciplinary hearing..." (Slowly shake your head.)

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""OFFICER IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE!" He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "OFFICER IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE!" Her eyes dart between you and Kim. "SUSPECT AT LARGE, GET ON THE GROUND!"

fields.Title: The Pigs: "The woman stands, slumped. She look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman stands, slumped. She looks catatonic under her mountain of RCM paraphernalia. Nothing more to do here.

fields.Title: You: ""No! The tare is mine. I collected..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No! The tare is mine. I collected it."

fields.Title: You: ""Are you on drugs?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you on drugs?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wait, officer!" the lieutenant sho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, officer!" the lieutenant shouts. "We're trying to *de*-escalate the situation! Adding more guns just makes it worse."

fields.Title: Half Light: "Enough! Fry me some bacon!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Enough! Fry me some bacon!

fields.Title: You: ""*Back-up*?! There's nothing to bac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Back-up*?! There's nothing to back up, nowhere to back down -- the terrible finale is on us!"

fields.Title: You: ""Me, back-up? More like a fuck-up...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Me, back-up? More like a fuck-up..."

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "Sometimes when things get very bad..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sometimes when things get very bad it's good to remind yourself that you have a body. By scratching it.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Does she not believe you two are ac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Does she not believe you two are actually police officers?

fields.Title: You: ""Hey, you're the one impersonating..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, you're the one impersonating a police officer!"

fields.Title: You: "Raise your hands."
fields.Dialogue Text: Raise your hands.

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""Back-up?" She lowers the megaphone..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Back-up?" She lowers the megaphone half-way, but immediately raises it again and screams: "BACK-UP, BACK-UP! STATUS UNCONFIRMED!"

fields.Title: You: ""You're not the police. *I* am the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're not the police. *I* am the police."
fields.Alternate1: "You're not the police. *We* are the police."
fields.Alternate2: "You're not the police, *I* am the police. I am the Law!"
fields.Alternate3: "You're not the police, *we* are the police. We are the Law!"

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""IT'S THE GODDAMN POLICE, SHIT-BAG,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "IT'S THE GODDAMN POLICE, SHIT-BAG," she yells into the megaphone. "HUG THE PAVEMENT, YOU'RE UNDER ARREST!"

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""SUSPECT AT LARGE ON FOOT," she yel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "SUSPECT AT LARGE ON FOOT," she yells in the megaphone. "PIGS IN PURSUIT, CUFF HIM, BOYS!"

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""LICENCE AND REGISTRATION!!!" She r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "LICENCE AND REGISTRATION!!!" She repeatedly bashes the megaphone against her head, then screams in the bloody mouthpiece: "LICENCE AND REGISTRATION! COME IN DISPATCH! SECTOR, SECTOR, AZIMUTH!!!"

fields.Title: You: ""We really are cops. Look, white re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We really are cops. Look, white rectangles!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now..." the lieutenant takes a dee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now..." the lieutenant takes a deep breath and steadies his voice, "... is not the time."

fields.Title: Empathy: "So that's how Cunoesse must have fe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So that's how Cunoesse must have felt, when you pointed the gun at her.

fields.Title: You: ""Patrol officer Pigs, I need your g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Patrol officer Pigs, I need your gun for inspection."
fields.Alternate1: "Officer, Pigs! Double-yefreitor Harrier Du Bois, requesting your sidearm for inspection." (Hold out your badge.)

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""Superseding event! Split-second de..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Superseding event! Split-second decision! Get on the ground! GET ON THE GODDAMN GROUND!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Be careful, detective. Don't do an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Be careful, detective. Don't do anything that might set her off."

fields.Title: Empathy: "In her mind the cavity search is ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In her mind the cavity search is happening, as long as she's saying it. It appears the things she says are very real to her.

fields.Title: You: "Confiscate the narcotics. (Wink!)"
fields.Dialogue Text: Confiscate the narcotics. (Wink!)

fields.Title: The Pigs: "You take the phial of pyrholidon an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You take the phial of pyrholidon and the bottle of speed. As evidence, obviously.

fields.Title: You: ""Baby, you know who I am -- everybo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Baby, you know who I am -- everybody knows." (Wink.)

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "There were narcotics in there too...."
fields.Dialogue Text: There were narcotics in there too. You're thinking of taking them? Do!

fields.Title: You: ""We really are cops. Look, my badge..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We really are cops. Look, my badge..." (Take out your badge and show it to her.)
fields.Alternate1: "I really am a cop. Look... my badge." (Take out your badge and show it to her.)

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""COMPLY, OR I WILL LIGHT YOU THE FU..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "COMPLY, OR I WILL LIGHT YOU THE FUCK UP!" she continues to yell as she lumbers about.

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""Show me your hands. This is the Pi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Show me your hands. This is the Pigs. Show me your hands *RIGHT NOW*," she screams in the megaphone. "SHOW ME YOUR HANDS RIGHT NOW!"

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""THIS IS THE POLICE!" She howls thr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "THIS IS THE POLICE!" She howls through her megaphone. "UNLAWFUL ENGAGEMENT. HANDS ON THE GROUND, SCUM-BAG!"

fields.Title: You: ""Ma'am, I need you to calm down. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ma'am, I need you to calm down. I just want to talk."
fields.Alternate1: "Ma'am, I need you to calm down. We just want to talk."

fields.Title: You: ""Easy, now. They're just chaincutte..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy, now. They're just chaincutters."

fields.Title: Half Light: "Doesn't want to hurt her?! This is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Doesn't want to hurt her?! This is flight or fight -- do or die.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're making it worse, officer,"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're making it worse, officer," the lieutenant says quietly. His eyes never leave the woman's face.

fields.Title: You: ""Suit yourself, but *I* need to dec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Suit yourself, but *I* need to decompress first." (Turn to leave.)

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Pigs: ""CONFINED QUARTERS, ASSAILANT COMIN..."]
You: ""You're not getting the porta-reel...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're not getting the porta-reel..."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "As she waves her hands, you notice..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As she waves her hands, you notice familiar-looking ampoules and packets sticking out the mountain of police gear on her back. Medicine? Or drugs?

fields.Title: You: ""I hear you, ma'am, look..." (Start..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I hear you, ma'am, look..." (Start slowly bending over.) "...hands going on the ground."

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""No," the crazed woman mumbles, sha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No," the crazed woman mumbles, shaking her head. "No, no, no... I though Mr. Morrand... Gareth..." Suddenly she raises the megaphone and screams: "AGGRAVATED ASSAULT, MAN DOWN, OFFICERS IN PURSUIT!"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Just trust me and go for the gun."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just trust me and go for the gun.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Again, a neurodegenerative disease."
fields.Dialogue Text: Again, a neurodegenerative disease.

fields.Title: You: ""Mine? No. It's ours, the RCM's.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mine? No. It's ours, the RCM's."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We can't leave. A delirious civili..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We can't leave. A delirious civilian is pointing a firearm at us. *Your* firearm. You *need* to solve this."

fields.Title: You: ""Blow her away, lieutenant!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Blow her away, lieutenant!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's eyes stay fixed on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant's eyes stay fixed on the woman and her gun -- he studies them closely, then mumbles: "Fascinating."

fields.Title: You: ""Patrol officer, you're in gross vi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Patrol officer, you're in gross violation of the RCM Code of Conduct."

fields.Title: You: ""If you want the prybar you're gonn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you want the prybar you're gonna have to... pry it from me."

fields.Title: You: ""I think so.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think so."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You'll have to go for the gun soone..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You'll have to go for the gun sooner or later... perhaps you can learn crucial facts before you do?

fields.Title: You: ""We *just* want to help, that's all.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "We *just* want to help, that's all."
fields.Alternate1: "I *just* want to help you, that's all."

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""LAW ENFORCEMENT COMPROMISED," she..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "LAW ENFORCEMENT COMPROMISED," she screams in the megaphone. Red and blue lights illuminate the spit flying everywhere. "IMPERSONATING A POLICE OFFICER!"

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""I *am* the police! Don't move! DON..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I *am* the police! Don't move! DON'T MOVE! Hands on your head! SUSPECT IS ARMED AND DANGEROUS!"

fields.Title: The Pigs: ""SUSPECT IS ARMED AND DANGEROUS! RE..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "SUSPECT IS ARMED AND DANGEROUS! REQUESTING IMMEDIATE BACK-UP!" She's now panting heavily. "RESISTING ARREST, BREAKER BREAKER, CUT HIM OFF!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What's the situation..." the lieut..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's the situation..." the lieutenant hesitates addressing the woman, "... officer?"

fields.Title: You: ""Just lower the gun, officer.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just lower the gun, officer."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, what if she's right and I ac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, what if she's right and I actually *am* an imposter?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""See?" He glances at you. "This is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "See?" He glances at you. "This is what happens, when we're not around."

fields.Title: You: ""Please, Pigs, just give me the gun.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Please, Pigs, just give me the gun."

fields.Title: Empathy: "In her mind you're under control no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In her mind you're under control now, the next moment you're not. It appears the things she says are very real to her, as long as she's saying them.

fields.Title: You: "Shake her shoulder."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shake her shoulder.

fields.Title: You: ""I need to do this case. I need eve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need to do this case. I need everything I can get."

fields.Title: Empathy: "So this is what the weather's like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So this is what the weather's like on the other end of a cop's gun?

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. I'm a detective with the 41st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. I'm a detective with the 41st Precinct."
fields.Alternate1: "Lieutenant double-yefreitor Harrier Du Bois, 41st Precinct. This is my partner, Lieutenant Kitsuragi, from the 57th."
fields.Alternate3: "I'm a detective with the 41st Precinct. This is my partner from the 57th."
